steps.name: I check that the "Welcome Screen" is displayed
I click on "GET STARTED" button
I check that the "Choose Data Preferences Screen" is displayed
I click on "ALLOW ALL TRACKING" button
I check that the "First SignIn Screen" is displayed
I click on "PHONE NUMBER" input
I enter the phone number "9738620000" in the input
I click on "LET'S GO" button
I check that the "Password Screen" is displayed
I click on "PASSWORD" input
I enter the password "#Test123" in the input
I click on "SIGN IN" button
I get the text from the middle text area on the "Notification Permission Screen"

I check that the application text: "Stay updated on in-store promotions, deals, savings and special offers!" is equals to expected value: "Stay updated on in-store promotions, deals, savings and special offers!"

parameters.name: Actual:
parameters.value: Stay updated on in-store promotions, deals, savings and special offers!

parameters.name: Expected:
parameters.value: Stay updated on in-store promotions, deals, savings and special offers!

steps.name: I check that the "Notification Permission Screen" is displayed
I click on "CONTINUE" button
I check that the "Location Permission Flow Screen" is displayed
I get the text from the middle text area on the "Location Permission Flow Screen"

I check that the application text: "Turn on your location so we can locate your closest Circle K store." is equals to expected value: "Turn on your location so we can locate your closest Circle K store."

parameters.name: Actual:
parameters.value: Turn on your location so we can locate your closest Circle K store.

parameters.name: Expected:
parameters.value: Turn on your location so we can locate your closest Circle K store.

steps.name: I click on "CONTINUE" button
I accept the new terms and conditions
I skip enrolling for easy pay card
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I check that the location services are enabled on real device
I check that the "Enable location" warning is displayed
I check that the "We can't find you" text is displayed
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I click on "CHANGE STORE" button
I check that the "Want to change store?" pane is displayed
I click on "SELECT STORE MANUALLY" button
I check that the "Stores Screen" is displayed
I click on "VIEW LIST/MAP" button
I click on "SEARCH BAR" input
I enter the "Illinois, USA" in the "SEARCH BAR" input
I check that the "Search Results Screen" is displayed
